TEXT.TITLE: TOYOTA MOTOR U.S.A. FEBRUARY CAR SALES DOWN
TEXT.BODY:
Toyota Motor Sales, U.S.A. Inc said its February car sales totaled 36,811, down from 40,012 last February. The company said February truck sales totaled 20,437, down from 28,519 a year earlier. Toyota said sales of its domestically produced Corolla models totaled 2,098 units during the month.
Reuter
